com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web

Interface HttpClientRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HttpClientMessage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HashableHttpRequest

    public interface HttpClientRequest
extends HttpClientMessage

    Encapsulates an HTTP request message sent to a server.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 08/15/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
